1. Visit the Instagram website (www.instagram.com).
2. Find Your Image: Browse Instagram and locate the image you want to download.
3. Right-Click: Using your right mouse button, right-click on the image you want to save. This action will trigger the opening of the original image in a new browser tab.
4. Save the Image.
